info.title: SSBU Mod Manager
info.author: Slackliniste
info.description: A simple mod manager for SSBU on Switch
info.details: HomebrewModManagerSSBU is a homebrew application that allows you to easily manage your SSBU mods directly from your Nintendo Switch. The application provides an intuitive console interface for enabling/disabling your mods with multilingual support and multiple sorting options.

changelog: v1.1.0\nImplemented scrollable mods list ( 24 mods per page) and global enable/disable button.
